lessons.japanese: タバコが値上がりするたびに、禁煙を試みる人は多い。
lessons.english: Every time cigarettes go up in price, many people try to give up smoking.

lessons.japanese: その問題が解けないなら、別の方法を試みるべきだ。
lessons.english: If you cannot work out the problem, you had better try a different method.

lessons.japanese: ケンは再度試みる勇気がない。
彼女は再び試みる事を心決めた。
lessons.english: She made up her mind to try again.

lessons.japanese: 彼は再び試みる事を決心した。
lessons.english: He made up his mind to try again.

lessons.japanese: 彼がどんな計画を試みるのかわからない。
lessons.english: I don't know what plan he will try.

lessons.japanese: タバコが値上がりするたびに、禁煙を試みる人は多い。
lessons.english: Every time cigarettes go up in price, many people try to give up smoking.

lessons.japanese: その問題が解けないなら、別の方法を試みるべきだ。
lessons.english: If you cannot work out the problem, you had better try a different method.

lessons.japanese: ケンは再度試みる勇気がない。
ケンは再度試みる勇気がない。
lessons.english: Ken isn't brave enough to try again.

lessons.japanese: 彼がどんな計画を試みるのかわからない。
lessons.english: I don't know what plan he will try.

lessons.japanese: 彼は再び試みる事を決心した。
lessons.english: He made up his mind to try again.

lessons.japanese: 彼女は再び試みる事を心決めた。
lessons.english: She made up her mind to try again.
